title: The Root Schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

items.title: The Items Schema
items.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

examples.description:
L'application web de _schoolsyst_ contient l'interface et tout ce avec quoi l'utilisateur interagit.
Cette application web est réalisée avec le _framework_ nuxt, qui permet la création d'application web. L'application communique avec la base de données de schoolsyst en utilisation [l'api de schoolsyst](/schoolsyst/api)
J'ai commencé par établir un [design de l'interface](/schoolsyst/design), puis j'ai développé l'application.
examples.name: Application web

name.title: The Name Schema
name.description: The work's name. Must be unique if `id` is omitted
examples: You Gotta Think Outside the Box

id.description: The work's id. Used internally and for URLs. Must be unique. Generated from the name if omitted

collection.description: The collection's id the work is part of. Can be null if the work has no collection.
collection.title: Collection ID

year.description: The year the work was finished.
year.title: Year

month.description: The month when the work was finished.
month.title: Month

front.description: The (extension-less) file name representing the 'main' variant, used for thumbnails

best.description: Whether this work is considered one of the best.
best.title: Best

wip.description: Whether this work is not finished.
wip.title: Work In Progress status

color.description: The work's main color. Determined from the `front` image when omitted.
color.title: Color

links.title: Links
links.description: Describes external links showcasing the work. Can be an object mapping link names to URLs, an array of objects or simply an URL.

using.title: Using
using.description: What techniques and/or software, frameworks or libraries were used for this work?

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags to apply to this work

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the work, with markdown support.

youtube.title: YouTube IDs
youtube.description: Specify YouTube IDs that represent the work directly.

playlist.title: YouTube playlist ID
playlist.description: The YouTube playlist ID. (ONLY the ID)

video.title: YouTube video ID
video.description: The YouTube video ID. (ONLY the ID)
